biotools.summary: The modular structure of α/β-hydrolases | The BioCatNet Database System aims to collect and present comprehensive information about biocatalysators: sequence, structure, educts, products, environmental conditions and kinetics | The Lipase Engineering Database (LED) version4.0.0 | Widmann M., Juhl PB. & Pleiss J. (2010). Structural classification by the Lipase Engineering Database: a case study of Candida antarctica lipase A. BMC Genomics 11: 123
